# BUILD ARGUMENTS REFERENCE (NOT ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES!)
# 
# This file shows all available build arguments for quick reference.
# These are NOT runtime environment variables and should NOT be in .env files.
# 
# For full documentation, see: ../BUILD-ARGS.md
# 
# Set these via:
#   docker build --build-arg INCLUDE_PYTHON=true .
#   OR in docker-compose.yml under build: args:

# Programming Languages
# ====================
INCLUDE_PYTHON=true          # Python 3.12 + pip + setuptools + Poetry

INCLUDE_GO=false             # Go 1.24.5
INCLUDE_RUST=false           # Rust stable + cargo + mdBook

INCLUDE_RUBY=false           # Ruby 3.3 via rbenv
INCLUDE_R=false              # R 4.0+ with tidyverse
INCLUDE_MOJO=false           # Mojo (x86_64 only)
